form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN:, 3030 Ross Road

full_text: 3030 Ross Road Palo Alto, California August 14, 1962. TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: We, the undersigned, certify that we are the owners of the following real properties recorded in the Office of the Recorder, County of Santa Clara, State of California: 1. Portion of Lot 73, C. M. Wooster Company's Subdi- vision of the Clarke Ranch, recorded July 14, 1954, in Book 2915 Official Records at page 511. 2. All of Lot 7, Block 46, Re-subdivision of Block 46, University Park, recorded April 5, 1955, in Book 3134 Offi- cial Records at page 210. 3. All of Lot 33, Block 1, Tract No. 848, recorded May 21, 1958 in Book 4079 Official Records at page 195. We further certify that any of the above mentioned properties could also be made available to house the family of Wai-Man Chu upon arrival to the United States, and 3030 Ross Road could be served as their permanent mailing address. In case the Wai-Man Chu's family were to reside in Marysville because of employment, any income from rental of 4079 Wilkie Way (formerly First St.), Palo Alto, shall be used to help the family to rent their quarters in Marysville. Harry Harry Wong Wong Katherine /Catherine C. Wong C. wang
